[Good]: Easy cancellation within 14 days of signup without penalty.
Clearly states your data won't be sold to third parties.
Provides 24/7 customer support for disputes or concerns.
[Bad]: Automatically renews yearly without sending reminders.
Charges a hidden administrative fee of $15 for late payments.
Allows company to change terms without notifying users in advance.
Results.[Rgpd]: This policy is compliant with RGPD regulations.
